items.sentence: Tom started a list, so he wouldn\'t forget anything.
I think you should find out when Tom plans to leave.
I think you should take the job Tom is offering you.
Who knows what might happen over the next few weeks?
Tom and Mary are both studying French, aren\'t they?
It wasn\'t difficult to convince Tom not to do that.
It wasn\'t the first time and it won\'t be the last.
I think we\'ve bought just about everything we need.
I didn\'t trust Tom and he didn\'t trust me, either.
Tom and Mary have been best friends for a long time.
